lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "These are very complex, deep problems that you don't change overnight," Woodard told Reuters in an interview as he outlined his vision of transforming de Havilland into a diversified manufacturer and an important cog in Boeing's worldwide operations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We found to our shock, to our surprise, last August we had very serious health and safety regulation violations," said Woodard.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Yet Woodard, a former Boeing executive, believes the makeover is absolutely essential to revitalize the historic company Boeing bought from the Canadian government a year ago.
